generated/widgetwidth.title: widgetwidth
generated/widgetwidth.description: GENERATED - Width of widget, minus padding

generated/widgetheight.title: widgetheight
generated/widgetheight.description: GENERATED - Height of widget, minus padding

generated/box2minsize.title: box2minsize
generated/box2minsize.description: GENERATED - Minimum size of Box 2. Based on 2 icons and padding

generated/widgetratio.title: widgetratio
generated/widgetratio.description: Copy of Widget ratio to check against. *All reading code should also update when complete*

generated/iconcount.title: iconcount
generated/iconcount.description: GENERATED - Number of icons visible in a Box 2. Based on widget size and padding
generated/iconcount.global_formula:
$lv(boxsize1, (if(gv(widgetorient) = 0, gv(generated/box2width), gv(generated/box2height))))$$lv(boxsize2, (#boxsize1 - gv(deviceiconsize)) / (gv(iconsize) + gv(iconpaddinginstack)))$
$lv(boxsize3, (#boxsize1 - gv(appiconsize)) / (gv(iconsize) + gv(iconpaddinginstack)))$$lv(boxsize, (if(#boxsize2 < 4, #boxsize3, #boxsize2)))$
$lv(icocount, if(#boxsize <= 2, 2, (tc(cut, mu(abs,#boxsize), 1))))$$#icocount$

generated/devicosize.title: devicosize
generated/devicosize.description: GENERATED - Shrink Device icon. Uses app icon size and padding to align outside edge of icons

generated/pagenum.title: pagenum
generated/pagenum.description: GENERATED - Number of current page for paging templates

generated/statuslist.title: statuslist
generated/statuslist.description: GENERATED - List of errors to output
generated/statuslist.entries: 0##"",1##"ERROR - #global not set correctly", 2##"ERROR - #global not set correctly", 3##"ERROR - #global not set correctly", 4##"ERROR - #global not set correctly"

generated/color1.title: color1
generated/color1.description: GENERATED - Background color generated from user settings for Box 1
generated/color1.global_formula: $lv(source, (if(gv(colors/color1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/color1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/color1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/color1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/color1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/color1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/color1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/color1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/color1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/color1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$$if(gv(colors/color1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(color1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/color1adj))))$$if(gv(colors/color1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(color2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/color1adj))))$$if(gv(colors/color1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/color1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/color1pick)))$$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/color1sel) <= 1, #color1, gv(colors/color1sel) = 2, #color2, gv(colors/color1sel) = 3, #col3)))$$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/color1alph), 0)))$$#final$

generated/color2.title: color2
generated/color2.description: GENERATED - Background color generated from user settings for Box 2
generated/color2.global_formula: $lv(source, (if(gv(colors/color2sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/color2sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/color2sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/color2fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/color2fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/color2fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/color2sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/color2fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/color2fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/color2fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$$if(gv(colors/color2fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(color1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/color2adj))))$$if(gv(colors/color2fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(color2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/color2adj))))$$if(gv(colors/color2fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/color2sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/color2pick)))$$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/color2sel) <= 1, #color1, gv(colors/color2sel) = 2, #color2, gv(colors/color2sel) = 3, #col3)))$$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/color2alph), 0)))$$#final$

tasker/data.title: DATA
tasker/data.value: -- Date sent and received from Tasker & HA

tasker/totasker.title: totasker
tasker/totasker.description: TASKER - Device control data to send to tasker from button click

tasker/fromtasker.title: fromtasker
tasker/fromtasker.description: State information sent from tasker to apply to "tasker/statedat". Only entitites listed in HA Tasker blueprint are sent.

formulas/devicestate.title: devicestate
formulas/devicestate.description: FORMULA - Code used to determine device state

formulas/lightlevel.title: lightlevel
formulas/lightlevel.description: FORMULA - Code used to determine light brightness level

formulas/lightcolor.title: lightcolor
formulas/lightcolor.description: FORMULA - Code used to determine light color

formulas/jsonaddnewline.title: jsonaddnewline
formulas/jsonaddnewline.description: Add new lines and in-line spaces to JSON to make it human-readable

formulas/jsonaddindents.title: jsonaddindents
formulas/jsonaddindents.description: Add corret indentation inside the JSON array to make it human-readable

formulas/stackalign.title: stackalign
formulas/stackalign.description: FORMULA - Box 2 stack group - icon positioning (if not centered)
formulas/stackalign.value: $if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, VERTICAL_RIGHT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, VERTICAL_LEFT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, HORIZONTAL_TOP,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, HORIZONTAL_BOTTOM)$

formulas/boxalign.title: boxalign
formulas/boxalign.value: $if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, CENTERRIGHT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, CENTERLEFT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, TOP,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, BOTTOM)$

formulas/boxsize.title: boxsize
formulas/boxsize.value: $lv(align, gv(widgetorient))$$lv(row, gv(box1dir2))$$lv(wgtdir, if(#align = 0, gv(generated/widgetheight), gv(generated/widgetwidth)))$$lv(pad, (#wgtdir - (if(#row = 1, gv(iconsize), #row = 2, ((gv(iconsize) * 2) + gv(iconpaddingstack))))))$

readme.title: README
readme.entries:
"Thanks for downloading HA Device Control Widget! Setup:
1. Use following settings to configure the UI for the style you want
2. Once UI is configured, read the setup instructions by clicking on the button in the widget.
Please note you'll need to have Tasker installed to facilitate communication to HA

The below global settings are to configure the interface, while HA communication is set up on each icon.
Box 1 - Smaller box, usually containing main device controls like power
Box 2 - Larger box, usually containing device controls such as volume or brightness

Created by Corey Welsh to fill the need of universal Home Assistant Android widget"

setupmode.title: setupmode
setupmode.description: MOVE TO BOTTOM - Enable showing setup data

colors/colornote.title: COLORNOTE
colors/colornote.entries: Edit widget colors by following through this setup. See Readme for details.

colors/color1sel.title: color1sel
colors/color1sel.description: Color 1 - Select the color source for Box 2 background. If you dont use the color picker, set a color you like, and it will be used as a fallback

colors/color1sysc.title: color1sysc
colors/color1sysc.description:
Color 1 - System/MaterialYou Only
Select a color tone.

colors/color1fil2.title: color1fil2
colors/color1fil2.description: Color 1 - Select filter manipulation - Changes slider above from total into add/subtract from current (optional)

colors/color1pick.title: color1pick
colors/color1pick.description:
Color 1 - Manual Color choice, overrides filter
Also used as fallback color for extracted colors

colors/color2sel.title: color2sel
colors/color2sel.description: Color 2 - Select the color source for Box 2 background. If you dont use the color picker, set a color you like, and it will be used as a fallback

colors/color2sysc.title: color2sysc
colors/color2sysc.description:
Color 2 - System/MaterialYou Only
Select a color tone

colors/color2fil2.title: color2fil2
colors/color2fil2.description: Color 2 - Select filter manipulation - Changes number above from total into add/subtract from current (optional)

colors/color2pick.title: color2pick
colors/color2pick.description:
Color 2 - Manual Color choice, overrides filter.
Also used as fallback color for extracted colors

colors/colico.title: colico
colors/colico.description: Color of icons and text. Default: #E7FFFFFF

colors/colicoon.title: colicoon
colors/colicoon.description: Color of icons and text when device is on

colors/color2fin.title: color2fin
colors/color2fin.description: Final output of color in Hex ARGB form

devicecount.title: devicecount
devicecount.description: Select how many devices you'd like to control with this Widget
devicecount.entries: DATA##"Select how many devices to control with this widget",1##1 Device,2##2 Devices,3##3 Devices

box1dir1.title: box1dir1
box1dir1.entries:
DATA##"Customize the size of Box 1 (smaller box).

Select how many columns (horizontal widget) or rows (vertical widget) to display in Box 1, or "Custom". "Custom" lets you set the percentage of the widget that Box 1 fills in the next list item.",0##Remove (Single Box Mode),1##1 Column (Auto-Center),2##2 Column (Auto-Center),3##Custom Size (Below)

box1dir2.title: box1dir2
box1dir2.description: Select how many Rows to display (or columns if widget is vertical)
box1dir2.entries:
DATA##"Customize Box 1.

Select how many rows (horizontal widget) or columns (vertical widget) to display in Box 1." ,1##1 Rows,2##2 Rows

boxorder.title: boxorder
boxorder.description: Set the order of the boxes on your widget
boxorder.entries:
DATA##"Set the order of the boxes on your widget.
Save the widget for changes to take effect",1##Box 1 > Box 2,0##Box 2 > Box 1

appiconhide.title: appiconhide
appiconhide.entries: DATA##"Hide the App Icons (smaller icons across from the Device icon)",1##Show App Icons,0##Hide App Icons

deviceicontype.title: deviceicontype
deviceicontype.description: Select the device icon to display in the corner of the widget or hide it in the next option
deviceicontype.entries: DATA##Select the device icon for the device you want to control,0##Lighting,1##Climate Control,2##Television,3##Audio,4##Security and Locks,5##Charging and Battery,6##Remote control,7##Appliances,8##Others

deviceiconposition.title: deviceiconposition
deviceiconposition.entries: DATA##"Select the location of the Device Icon on your Widget",1##Default Location,2##Inside Box 1 (for templates not using Box 1),3##Swap with settings icons,4##Hidden

deviceiconrotation.title: deviceiconrotation
deviceiconrotation.entries: DATA##"Select the rotation of the Device Icon on your Widget",NONE##0 Degrees,DEG90##90 Degrees,DEG180##180 Degrees,DEG270##180 Degrees,FLIP_X##Flip Vertically,FLIP_Y##Flip Horizontally

deviceiconsize.title: deviceiconsize
deviceiconsize.description:
Set the normal (default) size of the Device Icon. Auto-shrinking options avaliable below.
Default: 120kpx

iconsize.title: iconsize
iconsize.description:
Set the size of the widget icons.
Default: 80kpx

appiconsize.title: appiconsize
appiconsize.description:
Set the size of the small app-launcher icon(s).
Default: 32kpx

cornerradius.title: cornerradius
cornerradius.description:
Set the radius of the rounded corners.
Default: 10kpx

iconpaddinginstack.title: iconpaddinginstack
iconpaddinginstack.description: Set the icon padding inside each row/column. Default: 20kpx

iconpaddingstack.title: iconpaddingstack
iconpaddingstack.description: Set the icon padding between each row/column. Default: 20kpx

iconpaddingbox.title: iconpaddingbox
iconpaddingbox.description: Set the icon padding from the edge of Box 2. Default: 10kpx

paddingnote.title: PADDINGNOTE
paddingnote.entries: "The following options work best when your launchers "Remove Padding" option is set on this widget. This will allow near-seamless boundaries if you have multiple widgets."

verticalpadding.title: verticalpadding
verticalpadding.description:
Select the Vertical widget padding size
Default: 6kpx

horizontalpadding.title: horizontalpadding
horizontalpadding.description:
Select the Horizontal widget padding size
Default: 3kpx

-- 5..entries:
"Extra Options

Use the following settings to adjust "Automatic" widget functions

- Auto-align - Disable and set alignment and box position manually. Use the follow two settings to manually set alignment
- Box 2 Alignment - Center icons in Box 2 instead of aligning to Box 1
- Device Icon Shrinking options
- Remove Device Icon from padding and sizing calculations
- Remove Device Icon touch to open editor"

autoalign.title: autoalign
autoalign.description: Auto-align On/Off. Use next 2 options to manually set alignment

widgetorient.title: widgetorient
widgetorient.description: Set horizontal or vertical orientation of widget. 0 = Horizontal, 1 = Vertical

box1position.title: box1position
box1position.entries: LEFT##Left - Horizontal Layout, RIGHT##Right - Horizontal Layout, TOP##Top - Vertical Layout, BOTTOM##Bottom - Vertical Layout

box2align.title: box2align
box2align.entries:
DATA##"Select alignment of Box 2 content. Use for:
- Templates without icons (like komponents)
- Single box mode",0##Beside Box 1,1##Centered

deviceiconshrink.title: deviceiconshrink
deviceiconshrink.description:
Select Shrinking options for the Device Icon.
Default: Auto-Shrink
deviceiconshrink.entries: DATA##"Select Shrinking options for the Device Icon. Shrinking will allow more space for icons to fit. You can also remove the space that Device icon takes up on the widget to allow the icon to stay while making more room for icons",0##Default size,2##Default Size & Auto-Shrink For Space,1##Manually Shrink For Space

deviceappiconpadding.title: deviceappiconpadding
deviceappiconpadding.description: Use padding of Device/App icons from Box 2 in "Icon Count" calculation. Disable to allow more icons to fit in Box 2. Overlap may occur

deviceopeneditor.title: deviceopeneditor
deviceopeneditor.description: Enable device icon click to open KWGT Editor. Diable once widget is set up

appiconh.title: appiconh
appiconh.entries: DATA##"Hide the App Icons (smaller icons across from the Device icon)",0##Show App Icons,1##Hide App Icons

params.formula:
$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/color1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/color1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/color1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/color1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/color1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/color1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/color1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/color1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/color1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/color1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/color1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/color1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(color1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/color1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/color1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(color2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/color1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/color1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/color1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/color1pick)))$

$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/color1sel) <= 1, #color1, gv(colors/color1sel) = 2, #color2, gv(colors/color1sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/color1alph), 0)))$
$#final$

$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/color2sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/color2sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/color2sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/color2fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/color2fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/color2fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/color2sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/color2sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/color2fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/color2fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/color2fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/color2fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(color1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/color2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/color2fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(color2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/color2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/color2fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/color2sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/color2pick)))$


$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/color2sel) <= 1, #color1, gv(colors/color2sel) = 2, #color2, gv(colors/color2sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/color2alph), 0)))$
$#final$

$lv(srvccall, tc(split, gv(tasker/totasker), "&", 0))$$lv(entityid, tc(split, gv(tasker/totasker), "&", 1))$$lv(data, tc(split, gv(tasker/totasker), "&", 2))$$lv(recomb, (if(#srvccall = "template", ("tasker://secondary?service_call=" + #srvccall + "&parameters=" + #entityid), ("tasker://secondary?service_call=" + #srvccall + "&entity_id=" + #entityid + "&parameters=" + #data))))$$#recomb$

$lv(entity, tc(json, gv(tasker/fromtasker), ".entity_id"))$
$lv(exists, if(tc(json, gv(jsondb), "$.device_states[?(@.entity_id == '" + #entity + "')].entity_id") != "", 1, 0))$
$lv(datawipe, tc(reg, tc(reg, gv(jsondb), "\n", ""), "\s", ""))$
$lv(jsonwipe, tc(reg, tc(reg, gv(tasker/fromtasker), "\n", ""), "\s", ""))$
$lv(jsonrem, (if(#exists = 1, gv(formulas/jsonrementity), #datawipe)))$
$lv(jsonout, gv(formulas/jsonaddentity))$
$lv(jsonline, gv(formulas/jsonaddnewline))$
$lv(jarrcut, tc(split, tc(split, #jsonline, "[", 1), "]", 0))$
$lv(jarredit, tc(reg,#jarrcut, "\n", tc(utf, 0A) + "    "))$
$lv(jaddspc, gv(formulas/jsonaddindents))$
$lv(jremblnk, tc(reg, #jaddspc, tc(utf, 00), ""))$$#jremblnk$

$lv(align, gv(widgetorient))$
$lv(row, gv(box1dir2))$
$lv(wgtdir, if(#align = 0, gv(generated/widgetheight), gv(generated/widgetwidth)))$
$lv(pad, (#wgtdir - (if(#row = 1, gv(iconsize), #row = 2, ((gv(iconsize) * 2) + gv(iconpaddingstack))))))$
$gv(formulas/boxsize)$
$lv(size, (if(gv(box1dir1) = 1 | gv(box1dir1) = 2 | gv(box1dir1) = DATA, (#pad / 2), 0)))$
$lv(out, if(#size >= 1 & #size <= 40, #size, 0))$$#out$

$gv(formulas/boxsize)$$lv(tempsize, gv(box1dir1percent))$$lv(size, (if(gv(box1dir1) = 0, 0,gv(box1dir1) = 1, ((#pad + gv(iconsize)) * 100 / 720),gv(box1dir1) = 2 | gv(box1dir1) = DATA, ((#pad + (gv(iconsize) * 2) + gv(iconpaddinginstack)) * 100 / 720),#tempsize)))$$if(#align = 1, gv(generated/widgetwidth), #size >= 0, #size, 0)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, you can only control 2 rooms
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Note: If Column count is set to 1, you can only control 2 rooms 

Blank Template: Unlimited icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, the second icon will be hidden and reappear as "Icon 0" in Box 2

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2 

Note: If Column count is set to 1, you can only control 2 rooms 
Blank Template: 2-4 Icons (rooms)

Setup Blank Template:
-- Copy icons to icon folder in row groups (1 per folder)
-- Create a new global variable, etc, etc
-- See Docs?
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Pair with matching template in Box 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 2
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, the second icons will be hidden and reappear as "Icon 0" in Box 2

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Set column count to icon count
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: 2-4 icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons to Icon folder in row groups (1 per folder)
-- Image - Remove row groups and copy image

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: Unlimited icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, the second icon will be hidden and reappear as "Icon 0" in Box 2

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 1
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Set column count to icon count
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: 1-2 icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group (max 2)
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, you can only control rooms 1 + 2
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

internal_formulas.paint_color: $lv(glbname, "light.bedroom_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lightlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) >= 1, (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) <= 75, (if(gv(formulas/devicestate) = on, gv(generated/color1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.bedroom_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lightlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) >= 76, (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) <= 200, (if(gv(formulas/devicestate) = on, gv(generated/color1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.study_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lightlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) >= 1, (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) <= 75, (if(gv(formulas/devicestate) = on, gv(generated/color1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.study_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lightlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) >= 76, (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) <= 200, (if(gv(formulas/devicestate) = on, gv(generated/color1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.foyer_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lightlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) >= 1, (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) <= 75, (if(gv(formulas/devicestate) = on, gv(generated/color1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.foyer_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lightlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) >= 76, (if(gv(formulas/lightlevel) <= 200, (if(gv(formulas/devicestate) = on, gv(generated/color1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $lv(pos, if(gv(deviceiconposition) = DATA, 1, gv(deviceiconposition)))$$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, (if(#pos = 1, TOPLEFT, #pos = 2, CENTERRIGHT, #pos = 3, BOTTOMLEFT)),gv(box1position) = LEFT, (if(#pos = 1, TOPRIGHT, #pos = 2, CENTERLEFT, #pos = 3, BOTTOMRIGHT)),gv(box1position) = TOP, (if(#pos = 1, BOTTOMLEFT, #pos = 2, TOP, #pos = 3, BOTTOMRIGHT)),gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, (if(#pos = 1, TOPLEFT, #pos = 2, BOTTOM, #pos = 3, TOPRIGHT)))$
internal_formulas.position_offset_x: $lv(pos, (if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT | gv(box1position) = LEFT,((gv(generated/box1width) / 2) + gv(verticalpadding) - (gv(deviceiconsize) / 2)),gv(box1position) = TOP   | gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, 0)))$$if(gv(deviceiconposition) = 1 | gv(deviceiconposition) = 3, gv(verticalpadding),gv(deviceiconposition) = DATA, 1,gv(deviceiconposition) = 2, #pos)$
internal_formulas.position_offset_y: $lv(pos, (if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT | gv(box1position) = LEFT, 0,gv(box1position) = TOP   | gv(box1position) = BOTTOM,((gv(generated/box1height) / 2) + gv(horizontalpadding) - (gv(deviceiconsize) / 2)))))$$if(gv(deviceiconposition) = 1 | gv(deviceiconposition) = 3, gv(horizontalpadding),gv(deviceiconposition) = DATA, 1,gv(deviceiconposition) = 2, #pos)$

internal_formulas.icon_rotate_offset: $if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, 110, gv(box1position) = LEFT, 250,  gv(box1position) = TOP, 20,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, 110)$
$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, 110, gv(box1position) = LEFT, 250,  gv(box1position) = TOP, 20,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, 110)$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(deviceiconposition) = 3,(if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT,gv(box1position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)),(if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT,gv(box1position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)))$
$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$
$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
Widget Padding: $gv(verticalpadding)$ Side, $gv(horizontalpadding)$ Top
Icon: $gv(iconsize)$kpx, $tc(reg, gv(generated/iconcount), "\n", "")$ Vis
Icon Padding:$gv(iconpaddinginstack)$ Edge, $gv(iconpaddinginstack)$ MID

[bl=-10]Widget: $si(rwidth)$W, $si(rheight)$H, $si(rratio)$ 1:1
Box Area: $tc(reg, gv(generated/box2minsize), "\n", "")$ Min, $gv(generated/box2width)$W/$gv(generated/box2height)$H

$lv(icon, gv(iconsize) + gv(iconpaddinginstack))$$lv(lgbox, if(gv(widgetorient) = 0, gv(generated/box2width), gv(generated/box2height)))$$lv(adjustment, if(gv(deviceappiconpadding) = 1, gv(appiconsize), 0))$$lv(boxsize, #lgbox - #adjustment)$Icon to size ratio: $mu(abs, #boxsize /#icon)$[/bl]

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)$
